preferences.titledesc: Messages, warnings and questions which have been blocked. Your last response to these messages has been stored as a default response Instead of displaying these messages, the stored response is used. To unblock a message, delete its entry from this list.

pref.name: Blocked Messages
pref.tooltip: These messages and warnings are blocked. Your last answer has been remembered, and will be used as a default. To unblock a message, delete it from this list.
